General.Name: Zhong Fu Tong Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhong Fu Tong Group Co., Ltd. provides communication network construction, maintenance, and optimization services in China. It provides communication network construction, maintenance, and optimization services for telecom operators, communication equipment vendors, radio, and television networks; and technical services, such as communication network engineering construction, construction integration, operation management, fault repair and daily maintenance, and technical services. The company also offers informatization software services. In addition, the company provides communication systems, smart community management platforms, garbage classification intelligent monitoring systems, population information management systems, public security comprehensive management information systems, and social security comprehensive management and control platforms; and information management platform, smart house number management system, standard address management platform, public security e-convenience self-service systems, and other software and hardware products. Further, the company sells communication terminals, electronic products, and other parts. Zhong Fu Tong Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Chen  Lin
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM, Accounting Officer & Director
